full_summary:
### Janitorial Services – RCMP Nipawin Detachment

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-142-90458489
* **Solicitation Number**: M5000-24-2265/A
* **Publication Date**: February 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 14, 2024, at 16:00:00
* **GSOIN and UNSPSC**: N/A

#### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking tenders from experienced janitorial services suppliers to provide comprehensive cleaning and maintenance services for the RCMP Nipawin Detachment, located in Saskatchewan. The contract period will be for two years, with the option to extend for an additional two one-year periods.

The scope of work includes:

* Provision of all necessary labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and site supervision for janitorial services
* Cleaning services will be performed five days a week
* Daily site supervision will be required

#### Important Details

* Security requirements are outlined in the tender documents
* A site visit is scheduled for further details
* Bidders are required to submit their tenders to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the Invitation to Tender (ITT)
* Tenders must comply with all requirements outlined in the tender documents to be declared responsive
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract

#### Language and Accessibility

* Tenders may be submitted in either English or French
* Canada is committed to accessibility and encourages vendors to provide accessible formats for information and documents

#### Indigenous Procurement

* Suppliers are encouraged to review the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) for further information and registration details

#### Contact Information

* Qyitayo Ziwa, RCMP, can be contacted at Qyitayo.ziwa@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or 16396254151

#### Document Information

* Tender documents, including the Invitation to Tender (ITT) and instructions to bidders, are available on the Canada Buy Services (CBS) website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) under Tender Notice # M5000-24-2265/A.
